name: Lost Galaxy: Terra Wars Demo
description: As the Cruz family engages in horrible activities with the Norzanian aliens, they figured that they could steal all of the powerful Falserium on the planet of Terra. They were wrongly mistaken. Choose to fight along side the traitorous Cruz family, or the Stone family. These royal families have ruled their half of Terra for years until now. A war has broken out, Terra needs you to search the galaxy for more Falserium. This special and rare resource could rebuild a whole planet, and is useful for unlimited energy.
